description: A very nice ride through Wildhorse Canyon. The first 2 kms are a pretty challenging climb, followed by a relatively flat path through meadows and the canyon. We terminated at a bluff high up from the lake. Its a steep path down to the beach.
directions: Drive to the south end of Lakeshore Road. The trail begins on the other side of the street from the last house at the very south end of the road.
title: Wildhorse Canyon
